PrimaryBitmap.name: Primary Bitmap
PrimaryBitmap.description: Indicates the presence of data elements (1-64). If bit 1 is set, a Secondary Bitmap exists.

SecondaryBitmap.name: Secondary Bitmap
SecondaryBitmap.description: Indicates the presence of additional data elements (65-128).

0.name: MTI
0.description: Defines the message type. Example: 0100 - Authorization Request, 0200 - Financial Transaction, 0420 - Reversal.

2.name: PAN
2.description: Primary Account Number used for transaction processing. Must pass Luhn check.

3.name: Processing Code
3.description: Specifies transaction type and involved accounts. Example: 000000 - Debit, 200000 - Credit.

4.name: Transaction Amount
4.description: Total transaction amount, including decimals (last two digits).

11.name: System Trace Audit Number
11.description: Unique transaction identifier within a day.

12.name: Local Transaction Time
12.description: Time of transaction in hhmmss format.

18.name: Merchant Category Code
18.description: Classifies merchant type for regulatory and fee purposes.

22.name: POS Entry Mode
22.description: Indicates how card data was entered (e.g., 021 - Magnetic Stripe, 051 - Chip, 071 - Contactless).

32.name: Acquiring Institution ID
32.description: Identifies acquiring institution handling the transaction.

37.name: Retrieval Reference Number
37.description: Unique identifier assigned by the acquirer.

38.name: Authorization ID Response
38.description: Code returned by issuer for transaction authorization.

42.name: Merchant ID
42.description: Uniquely identifies the merchant accepting the transaction.

54.name: Additional Amounts
54.description: Contains additional financial details if required.

55.name: EMV Data
55.description: Contains EMV chip data for authentication.

67.name: Extended Payment Code
67.description: Indicates the payment processing method used for the transaction, if required by the issuer.

90.name: Original Data Elements
90.description: Contains details of the original transaction, including message type, system trace audit number, and local date/time when applicable.

95.name: Replacement Amounts
95.description: Specifies the successfully processed amount when different from the authorized amount, commonly used for ATM partial dispenses.

96.name: Message Security Code
96.description: Security password assigned by the processor, required when specific values are present in DE 70 (Network Management Information Code).

98.name: Payee
98.description: Identifies the recipient of a payment transaction if available.

100.name: Receiving Institution Identification Code
100.description: Used for transaction routing when based on this field instead of the PAN.

102.name: Account Identification 1
102.description: Primary account number or identifier copied from the original transaction message.

103.name: Account Identification 2
103.description: Secondary account number or identifier copied from the original transaction message.

104.name: Transaction Description
104.description: Provides additional information about the transaction if available.

105.name: Large Private Data 1
105.description: Reserved for proprietary or private data if applicable.

106.name: Large Private Data 2
106.description: Reserved for additional private data storage if needed.

107.name: Large Private Data 3
107.description: Reserved for additional proprietary data if applicable.

108.name: Large Private Data 4
108.description: Reserved for proprietary use if additional storage is needed.

113.name: Authorizing Agent Institution ID Code
113.description: Identifies the institution authorizing the transaction, required only if requested by the issuer.

120.name: Account Qualifiers
120.description: Provides additional details related to the account, required only if requested by the issuer.

122.name: Sponsor Bank ID
122.description: Identifies the sponsor bank, required only if requested by the issuer.

123.name: Additional Data
123.description: Contains supplementary verification data, including Address Verification Service (AVS) details.

124.name: Tag Data, Acquirer
124.description: Includes tag-length-value (TLV) formatted data, if available, from the acquiring entity.

125.name: Tag Data, Issuer
125.description: Includes tag-length-value (TLV) formatted data, if available, from the issuing entity.

126.name: Issuer Trace Data
126.description: Contains traceability information specific to issuer transactions, used in Mastercard Network Exchange.

127.name: Acquirer Trace Data
127.description: Includes transaction trace data from the acquirer. Not sent to ISO issuers by default but can be enabled.

128.name: Message Authentication Code
128.description: Used for message integrity verification when MACing is required and specific data elements (DE 65-127) are present.
